Quickstrike glanced around neavrous for a second but quickly shook 
it off.
'Ya can't show weakness or they'll think yer' yellow,'  he thought 
to himself.  He got into a fighting stance with his snake mouth 
opened and ready to fight.
"Alright who's the guy who thinks he's toughter then I am!?"  
Quickstrike demanded to whoever was listening.

> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:

chain's from

ol'

towards the
